item.title: About
item.description: This blog is about areas of interests and research of the members of MI2 Group. It is primarily maintained by Alicja Gosiewska and Mateusz Staniak.

item.title: Example Post
item.description: This is an example, showing how to create posts with code and images. Here you can read about contributing and posting on this blog. Markdown and R Markdown This post is created with R Markdown, however posts written in simple Markdown are also fine. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. Raw code is availible here. Includng R code and results fit <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars) fit ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = dist ~ speed, data = cars) ## ## Coefficients: ## (Intercept) speed ## -17.
